name: A Web of Lies
description: You are trapped in an ever-expanding Tholian web! What horrific future have you been drawn into, and how will you escape?
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Dahj, Kestra, Tholian Prisoner, Warp Theorists, Caregivers, Suspiria, or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
-- Using the Tholian Ship, Pike's U.S.S Enterprise, or the Klingon K'Vort Bird of Prey will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Dahj, Kestra, Tholian Prisoner, Warp Theorists, Caregivers, or Suspiria

action.name: My People Will Find Your Ship

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: Klingon K'Vort Bird-of-Prey
ship.flavor: A versatile craft often used for scouting and patrolling. The K'Vort-class is the most stable iteration of this design.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

next_threshold_rewards.name: Credits
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

screens.text: "Watch out! That Tholian ship in front of you, it's about to form the--"
"Omnitriangulation of three-hundredth fifty-seventh sector complete. One new ship estimated to be captured. Surrender is an unnecessary redundancy."
"Go to hell! Listen, I don't know how you got here or where you're from, but you're about to be caught in a Tholian web with the last of Starfleet. Help us find a way out of this!"
"Construction of the web's stopped. I think we're safe, for a while."

responses.text: "We've never been at war with the Tholians! Is this the future?"
"What is a child doing on a Starfleet ship? How desperate are we?"
"Sounds like Kes was right about Suspiria...."

screens.text: "Thank you, Captain. That's the first lull we've had in days. This war with the Tholians has been bloody and was about to be very short--with us on the losing side."
"I'm not a child. No one in the Federation has that luxury anymore."
"Who's Suspiria? I've never heard of her. Is she a Tholian?"
"Your ship is an older model. The chronitons around it don't match up with ours. That suggests to me that you ARE from the past--before this war began."

"We don't know why the Tholian Assembly declared war on the Federation. All we know is that when they did, they had more ships and firepower than we could match. The ships trapped in this web are all that's left. We have to break it if we're going to have any hope of victory."
